text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I'm discussing today's training with<n>Narita Brian,
when...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Got it. Guess I'm running laps today,<n>then.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...What are you doing? Let's go.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'm ready to run, so I'm going ahead.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
...There's a nice breeze. It's got my<n>blood
pumping—I feel like I could run to<n>the end of the
earth.
I see. Wind... Blood... Run...
Uh, uh-oh!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Tch. No way I can ignore that.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Come out, you lil' rat. I know you're in<n>the bushes.
A-all right!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: What's up, Brian?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
...What do you think you're doing,<n>following me
around from the crack of<n>dawn?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Well... Hm... Hmph... Guess I'm busted.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...Oh? That's quite the attitude.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ...Oh? Look who's talking.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: No way! It's... an homage. I totally<n>respect Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...I don't get what you're saying.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I wanna be just like you! I wanna be<n>powerful and
cool!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's why I started followin' you this<n>morning.
I've been studyin' the way you<n>move and how you
talk!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You want to be... like me?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You think you can compare to me with a<n>shallow
impersonation? ...Don't kid<n>yourself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
If you wanna run on the same track as<n>me, come
prepared to tear it to shreds.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: O-of course!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
...I look up to you and your unshakable,<n>
straightforward confidence.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna run just as fast as—no, I'm<n>gonna
surpass you! You'll see!
choice_data_list: That determination is a strength in itself.

Want to do some partner running to test your
strength?

Want to do some partner running to test your
strength?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm gonna run just as fast as—no, I'm<n>gonna
surpass you! You'll see!
choice_data_list: That determination is a strength in itself.

Want to do some partner running to test your
strength?

Want to do some partner running to test your
strength?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Really?! So does that mean I'm gettin'<n>closer to
being the real deal?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Then I don't have time to stand around<n>and chat! I
gotta train too!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hmph... Not just match me, but you<n>think you can
surpass me?! That's quite a<n>loud bark you got.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: But it's me who'll be biting.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
It could be because she was provoked,<n>but she's
even more vigorous than usual<n>in training
afterward.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Huh?! C-can I really?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I had no intention of allowing this... but I<n>guess
you're free to follow me of your<n>own accord.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Augh! I lost! One more, please!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Hmph... It doesn't matter how many<n>times we go,
I'll still defeat you.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
They continue until Vodka has had<n>enough, and it
turns out to be a very<n>productive training session.
